sections.summary:
My goal is to utilize my 20 years of banking experience and education in business management and human resources in order to expand on my
management experience. Skilled in financial reporting, account balancing and reconciliation, project management, and analytics.
Highlights
Quantitative analysis & metrics
Account reconciliation & balancing Expert in MS Office Suite
Complex problem solving Conflict resolution
Staff leadership and development Strong interpersonal skills
Procedure development
